explain:
Kedua persamaan di atas memberikan hubungan

$$\begin{equation*}\tan^{2}{c} + \tan^{2}{b} - 2 \tan{b} \tan{c} \cos{A} = \sec^{2}{c} + \sec^{2}{b} - 2 \sec{b} \sec{c} \cos{a}\end{equation*}$$

dengan menggunakan hubungan $\sec^{2}{x} = 1 + \tan^{2}{x}$ dapat diperoleh

$$\begin{eqnarray*}\tan^{2}{c} + \tan^{2}{b} - 2 \tan{b} \tan{c} \cos{A} &=& 2 + \tan^{2}{c} + \tan^{2}{b} - 2 \sec{b} \sec{c} \cos{a}\\- 2 \tan{b} \tan{c} \cos{A} &=& 2 - 2 \sec{b} \sec{c} \cos{a}\\- \frac{\sin{b} \sin{c} \cos{A}}{\cos{b} \cos{c}} &=& 1 - \frac{\cos{a}}{\cos{b} \cos{c}}\\\cos{b} \cos{c} - \cos{a} &=& - \sin{b} \sin{c} \cos{A}\\\cos{a} &=& \cos{b} \cos{c} + \sin{b} \sin{c} \cos{A}\end{eqnarray*}$$
